mapper.insert: insert into teachers (tea_num, name, password, subject) values (#{teaNum}, #{name}, #{password}, #{subject})
mapper.select: select tea_num teaNum, name, email, password, subject, profile_image profileImage from teachers
select tea_num teaNum, name, email, password, subject, profile_image profileImage from teachers where email like #{value}
select tea_num teaNum, name, email, password, subject, profile_image profileImage where email like #{email} and password like #{password}
